lifestyle.work_life: Office job, mostly sitting. Tries to take stairs.
lifestyle.home_life: Lives alone, cooks 3-4 times a week, enjoys weekend hikes.
lifestyle.sports_habits: Goes to the gym twice a week for weightlifting, occasional jogging.
lifestyle.dietary_preferences: Loves chicken and fish, avoids excessive red meat. No known allergies.
lifestyle.goals: Lose 5kg of fat and improve overall fitness in 3 months.

body_fat_analysis.feedback: Mock analysis: Visual assessment based on provided image and user metrics.

current_diet_plan.summary: A balanced 7-day diet plan focusing on lean protein, whole grains, and ample vegetables to support fat loss and fitness goals. Calorie target approximately 2200 kcal/day.

monday.breakfast: Scrambled eggs (3) with spinach and 1 slice whole-wheat toast. Coffee/Tea.
monday.lunch: Large mixed green salad with 150g grilled chicken breast, mixed vegetables, light vinaigrette.
monday.dinner: 180g Baked salmon with 1 cup quinoa and steamed broccoli.

tuesday.breakfast: Oatmeal (50g dry) cooked with water/milk, topped with berries and a few almonds.
tuesday.dinner: Lean beef stir-fry (150g) with mixed vegetables (bell peppers, onions, carrots) and 1/2 cup brown rice.
tuesday.snacks: Protein shake (1 scoop), Handful of walnuts

wednesday.breakfast: Smoothie: 1 scoop protein powder, 1/2 banana, spinach, unsweetened almond milk.
wednesday.lunch: Tuna salad (1 can in water, mixed with Greek yogurt instead of mayo) on 2 whole-grain crackers, side of cherry tomatoes.
wednesday.dinner: Chicken and vegetable skewers (180g chicken) with a side of sweet potato (1 medium).

thursday.breakfast: Greek yogurt (200g) with chia seeds and a drizzle of honey.
thursday.dinner: Lentil soup (large bowl) with a slice of whole-grain bread.

friday.breakfast: Whole-wheat pancakes (2 small) with berries and a light syrup.
friday.lunch: Turkey breast sandwich (100g turkey) on whole-wheat bread with lettuce, tomato, mustard. Side salad.
friday.dinner: Homemade pizza on whole-wheat pita bread with tomato sauce, low-fat mozzarella, and plenty of vegetables (e.g., mushrooms, bell peppers, onions).
friday.snacks: Rice cakes (2) with almond butter, Banana

saturday.breakfast: Omelette with 2 eggs, cheese (30g), and mixed vegetables.
saturday.lunch: Large salad with chickpeas, feta cheese, cucumber, tomatoes, olives, and a lemon-tahini dressing. (Active day - larger portion)
saturday.dinner: Grilled steak (150g lean cut) with a large portion of roasted asparagus and a small baked potato.

sunday.lunch: Roast chicken (180g) with roasted root vegetables (carrots, parsnips).
sunday.dinner: Flexible meal - focus on lean protein and vegetables. Could be a healthy homemade dish or a carefully chosen restaurant meal.
sunday.snacks: Yogurt with fruit, Small dark chocolate square

current_diet_plan.notes_from_gemini: Remember to drink plenty of water throughout the day. Adjust portion sizes based on hunger and activity levels. This plan can be customized further based on weekly progress and preferences.
